NAME.Nominative: Friday of the Fifth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Friday of the Fifth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 8<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Supremely praised art Thou, O Christ our God, Who shakest the earth, to convert and to save them that dwell therein, and yet establishest it in Thy goodness and ineffable compassion; through the intercessions of the Theotokos, have mercy on us.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Of mercy and judgement will I sing unto Thee, O Lord.
Of mercy and judgement will I sing unto Thee, O Lord.
SEXTE.STICHOS: I will chant and have understanding in a blameless path.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: and let my cry come unto Thee.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Turn not Thy face from me.
